meanings.definition: The position or office of a treasurer.
meanings.sent1: She was proud to be appointed to the treasurership of the club.
meanings.sent2: The treasurership required careful management of the organization's finances.
meanings.sent3: Taking on the treasurership meant she had to keep a close eye on the budget.
meanings.sent4: The treasurership was like being the guardian of the group's money.
meanings.sent5: Her treasurership was crucial for the financial stability of the team.

meanings.definition: The responsibilities or duties of a treasurer.
meanings.sent1: Managing the treasurership involved handling all financial transactions.
meanings.sent2: She took her treasurership seriously and ensured all accounts were balanced.
meanings.sent3: The treasurership sometimes felt like a juggling act with numbers.
meanings.sent4: In her treasurership, she was the financial backbone of the organization.
meanings.sent5: The treasurership required a keen eye for detail and accuracy.
